testsuite.name: User Entity Tests

testcase.name: Parameterized constructor should set username, email, and password
toString() should contain all user information
Setters and getters should work correctly
toString() should handle null values gracefully
hashCode() should be equal for equal objects
equals() should return true for users with same content
equals() should return false for users with different content
equals() should return false when compared to different type
equals() should return true when object is compared to itself
Should add and delete a user
Default constructor should create empty user
equals() should return false when compared to null
